item.description:
“You read countless famous self-help and spiritual books; you study and apply ancient Universal laws and principles; you attend numerous workshops, retreats, and conferences; you are an active member of a religious or spiritual community; and yet you’re left saying over and over, “God, it’s not working!” YOU HAVE LOST TRACK OF YOUR ONE KEY ABILITY THAT POWERS AND EMPOWERS ALL YOU DO!”

 Come and let Vincent show you: • What’s not working, • Why it’s not working, • How to get it working, and the • Real secret, bottom-line, miracle answer that will allow you to fulfill your dreams and create the life you want!

After this program you won’t want to miss out on Saturdays full day program!

Friday, March 9, 2012

7:00 to 9:00 pm

with, Vincent Genna, MSW

Internationally Acclaimed Spiritual Teacher and Intuitive Messenger

 ______________________________________________

ON Saturday, March 10, 2012

10:30 - 4:00 p.m.

"Make the real secret, bottom-line, miracle answer work, so you can fulfill your dreams and create the life you want! You do not want to miss this experiential workshop and reverie, even if you missed the lecture on Friday!"

During the “God, it’s not working!” workshop, Vincent will show you:

• Your ego is vital to your existence as a spiritual being;

• Your ego is not the culprit keeping you from experiencing your Divineness;

• God wants you to enhance your ego;

• How to recognize and disempower automatic thoughts, feelings, and behaviors that are stopping you from creating the life you want; and

• How to re-empower and reinforce your Divine gifts;

* NOTES: Since Sunday's all day reading spots with Vincent are almost sold out and he wants to help as many people as possible during his time here, he will be doing Gallery Readings during his lecture and workshop on Friday and Saturday. So, register now and come with your best questions!

Also, if you are inspired to come to this event, but finances are an issue, Vincent is offing scholarships based on financial need. Please email us for further information.

CLICK HERE FOR MORE INFORMATION ABOUT VINCENT!

CLICK HERE TO REGISTER OR TO REQUEST A SCHOLARSHIP!

CLICK HERE TO CHECK OUT VINCENT'S RADIO SHOW!

group.name: The First Spiritualist Church of Quincy

item.name: Stop Saying, "God, it's not working! Lecture & Workshop, with Vincent Genna, MSW
